original_text: He hath delivered my soul in peace from the battle that was against me: for there were many with me.
korean_text: 나를 대적하는 자 많더니 나를 치는 전쟁에서 그가 내 생명을 구원하사 평안하게 하셨도다

sentences.original_text: He hath delivered my soul in peace
from the battle that was against me
for there were many with me
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 나와 함께 있는 자가 많았음이라
